title: The Seven Chinese Sisters
description: Once there were seven Chinese sisters who lived together and took care of each other. Each one had a special talent. When baby Seventh Sister is snatched by a hungry dragon, her loving sisters race to save her. In this update of a classic Chinese folk tale, each sister uses her talent in a surprising way to rescue baby Seventh Sisterâ€•and even Seventh Sister turns out to have an unexpected skill!
author: Kathy Tucker
